answers.answer: I had preeclampsia  with  my daughter. I was induced at 37 weeks.  I didn't  have a c section.

With my first I had eclampsia and help syndrome so when I started early signs of preeclampsia witg my second I was induced at 37 weeks. My son was 7lbs and totally healthy at 37 weeks...it depends on if the doc put a stat order on your tests..if you feel like you need to just show up to labor and delivery and they'll take care of you. You can also call an after hours line for most places, but, you're right, usually no news is good news but just keep an eye in yourself and do what you feel you need to do.
Thank you very much ladies.. I appreciate you getting back to me. Glad everything turned out ok for you and your little ones!

question: 37 weeks-I am showing signs of preclampsia with the high blood pressure and protein in my urine.. I just got done with all the testing. Dr. Said if it gets worse I'll be induced this coming week.. well.. just found out baby girl is breeched so probably have to have schedule c-section.. How long does it take to know my results?  Will They contact me if it's bad? since it's the weekend.Did Any ladies have to have baby even with slight preclampsia symptoms?
title: 37 nervous!! Question
